locations.name: Tokyo
locations.description: The vibrant capital, starting point of the tour, known for its dazzling lights, energy, and futuristic architecture.

locations.name: Tsumago (Kiso Valley)
locations.description: A preserved post town on the Nakasendo Trail in the tranquil Kiso Valley, offering an experience of rural Japan and history. Chosen as a representative overnight location within the described Kiso Valley segment.

locations.name: Kyoto
locations.description: The cultural heart of Japan, featuring Zen gardens, the Arashiyama Bamboo Grove, and the historic Gion district.

locations.name: Miyajima Island (Itsukushima)
locations.description: Sacred island famous for the 'floating' torii gate of Itsukushima Shrine. Staying on the island is implied to experience the sunset views mentioned.

locations.name: Lake Kawaguchi (Fuji Five Lakes)
locations.description: Located in the Fuji Five Lakes region, offering iconic and stunning views of Mount Fuji reflected in the lake waters, serving as the concluding location.
